solution_line_template: If Philip scored twice the number of points Noa scored to win the bowl, he scored {multiplier_for_philip}*{noa_score} = <<{multiplier_for_philip}*{noa_score}={philip_score}>>{philip_score} points.
To win the bowl, they scored together a total of {philip_score}+{noa_score} = <<{philip_score}+{noa_score}={total_score}>>{total_score} points.
